channel.title: Comments on: WTF: Gina Gershon’s lost cat inspires entire album

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: I'm speechless. Well, actually, I'm stifling guffaws because I don't want to wake up my sleeping husband. That's up there with Devastatin' Dave, Orleans, and Millie Jackson as far as bad album cover art. Great way to start my morning.
item.content:encoded: I’m speechless. Well, actually, I’m stifling guffaws because I don’t want to wake up my sleeping husband. That’s up there with Devastatin’ Dave, Orleans, and Millie Jackson as far as bad album cover art. Great way to start my morning.
